name: Tax Town
description:
This game created by:

  • Yohanes Tennary Rinto Pradhana (Game Artist)
  • Theofani Drya Kharisma (Game Designer)
  • Riani BM (Noob Programmer)

Tax town is about learning tax by answering some questions related to tax in Indonesia. This game built on 5 levels but can just be played in 3 levels only because we want make the 2nd season as the final round.

There's no worry for the player to play without concerning about their coins or life in game because:

  1. From the beginning, each player has already had their own money (coin) as a citizen.
  2. Life will not be decreased, so the player can play the game on and on. If their answer is false, there will be 2 options either to continue or to back on the previous question.

Each level will gain some coins that can buy useful thing to town. So that, we hope the player know that by paying tax, the tax itself can be used for the town/city.
